GENERAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following is a characteristic of 
endothermic animals? 
 
W) They have a higher metabolism in warm weather 
X) They are more aggressive overall as compared to cold-blooded animals 
Y) They are found only in warm climates 
Z) They maintain a constant internal temperature at all air temperatures
bonusA:
Z) THEY MAINTAIN A CONSTANT INTERNAL TEMPERATURE AT ALL AIR 
TEMPERATURES

bonusQ:
LIFE SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following statements it true about pollen? 
 
W) Pollen must be transferred between plants by insects 
X) Pollen travels through the style and directly fertilizes the ovule 
Y) Either before or after arriving on the stigma, each pollen grain undergoes a mitotic cell 
division producing two sperm 
Z) Pollen is a gamete
bonusA:
Y) EITHER BEFORE OR AFTER ARRIVING ON THE STIGMA, EACH POLLEN 
GRAIN UNDERGOES A MITOTIC CELL DIVISION PRODUCING TWO SPERM
